data.text:
Xweave:
- Raised: $3.00M | Stage: Seed | Has token: No
- Investors: Jungle Ventures and 6 others
- Description: Singapore-based fintech platform for real-time, compliant cross-border payments via a blockchain-powered, non-custodial infrastructure integrating fiat and stablecoin networks.
- Website: https://t.co/QQ1C3CHLMy

AppLayer $APPL:
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Undisclosed | Has token: No
- Investors: Arcanum Ventures
- Description: Modular blockchain platform featuring a Blockchain Development Kit, EVM-compatible network, and cross-chain interoperability for building and connecting app-specific chains.
- Twitter: @AppLayerLabs

BVNK:
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Strategic | Has token: No
- Investors: Visa
- Description: Banking and payments platform for crypto-native businesses, enabling fiat and crypto payments, multi-currency asset holding, and global transfers via a developer-friendly API.
- Twitter: @BVNKFinance

CodeAnt AI
- Raised: $2.00M | Stage: Seed | Has token: No
- Investors: Y Combinator and 5 others
- Description: AI-powered code review platform that automates detection of code quality issues and security vulnerabilities, integrates with IDEs and CI/CD, and supports 30+ languages to cut review time and bugs by 50%.
- Twitter: @CodeAntAI
If you own any doodles, think I minted a few from Zora and Layer3 quests, $DOOD airdrop

Provide a report about the business/project with valuable insights for the future, SWAT/competitor analysis, etc: reward 0.

Be a influencer/kol and share a tweet about the business/project. reward $$$$.

Lesson? Doesn't matter, just get payed upfront xD

Fuze
- Raised: $12.20M | Stage: Series A | Has token: No
- Investors: Galaxy and 2 others
- Description: Fuze offers a white-label platform that enables banks, fintechs, and enterprises to launch regulated digital asset products like stablecoins, CBDCs, and tokenized assets without managing blockchain or compliance complexities.
- Twitter: @fuzefinance

ORBITGRIFT
- Raised: N/A | Stage: Incubation | Has token: Yes
- Investors: Alliance DAO
- Description: ORBITGRIFT is a DeFi AI agent on Solana offering token swaps, bridging, staking, lending, and portfolio management, with the ORBIT token actively traded and supporting its utility ecosystem.

Sentora
- Raised: $25.00M | Stage: Undisclosed | Has token: No
- Investors: New Form Capital and 6 others
- Description: Sentora is an institutional-grade DeFi platform offering yield strategies, risk management, compliance tools, and structured products, merging IntoTheBlock’s analytics with Trident’s financial structuring expertise.
- Website: https://t.co/vaEsV0HaW0

Litheum
- Raised: $750.00K | Stage: Strategic | Has token: No
- Investors: Amber Group and 1 other
- Description: Litheum is a layer1 blockchain using a unique Proof of Performance consensus to enable microtransactions and large-scale AI agent operations, with low fees, fast processing, and EVM compatibility for DeFi and AI-focused dApps.
- Twitter handle: @LitheumOfficial

RT @flb_xyz: 30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurr…

30 Days of HyperEVM: Day 20

For today we are diving back into a more heavy DeFi focus with an options platform called @supurr_app

- Visit https://t.co/3pKPLI019u and connect your wallet
- Create your account by signing a transaction and then register the account
- Visit the Wrap tab and wrap some of your HYPE
- Go to Trade and approve WHYPE spending
- Place some Up/Down or Above/Below bets with specified time intervals

Let's see if I can trade profitably lmao

30 Days of Monad Testnet: Day 20

This issue will cover OctoSwap, another DEX building on Monad

- Visit https://t.co/rhtLbHfNgL and connect your wallet
- Swap some tokens (I recommend getting some OCTO)
- Go to the liquidity tab and supply liquidity for one of the available pairs

Pretty simple interactions today, but the team is working on building out a Profile section with referrals as well as some games

RT @flb_xyz: For anyone that deposited in the Berachain x Concrete vaults you can now claim your funds

Check the quote-tweeted thread and…

For anyone that deposited in the Berachain x Concrete vaults you can now claim your funds

Check the quote-tweeted thread and scroll through for the different claim links (Lombard, Ethena, Dinero)

As you probably already know the yield was dust so time to find a new place to deploy funds, there are a ton of options

The Doodles airdrop checker is live: https://t.co/VMAALqJWyd

This is pretty much straight dust for me and comes off as another way to extract from the Doodles image

I remember seeing the announcement of $DOOD but haven't seen anything regarding utility since

Insta-jeet for me https://t.co/Un58b90BOE

Make sure to turn your notifications on for posts by Fogo

Fogo's custom X leaderboard is based on your engagement with posts from their account

If you comment and engage earlier, you have higher odds of better responses/impressions/etc

I am currently trying to get more active

Nahhh, I just got cooked by Succinct

1.44x multiplier on 100+ stars

Depressing roadblock on my Succinct stars journey but we keep it pushing

What's the lowest multiplier you've gotten? Is it possible to get 1.00? https://t.co/xL6QJUpQIy

Skate just dropped their eligibility checker for their Kaito leaderboard Ollie rewards

- Visit https://t.co/2li73KnLTS and connect your X
- Select Leaderboard Rewards to see if you are eligible

Unfortunately, I was not eligible this time but as someone who is a big fan of interoperability and chain abstraction, I do want to get more involved with Skate

The team just dropped a 1,000 slots for the beta today but unfortunately I saw it too late :/

It's crazy how unserious blockchains can be lmao

Succinct's Blinky drank too much lean and is now disabled until Stage 2

With multiple games now disabled it seems we are getting closer and closer to a Succinct update

Does anyone know why certain games get disabled first? https://t.co/2R0bCzOxPd
